ProjectTitle: Characterization of the early immune events underlying food-induced abdominal pain
InitialFeedbackHistory: 28/07/2022 2. [REDACTED] you don't have to list your manuscripts and presentations, but list the samples that you will collect, these are considered physical data. 3. [REDACTED] please also include the reference number for the studies with mice, or indicate that no new approval is needed if you only reuse samples that were already collected. 6. [REDACTED] please note that the UZL ethical committee recommends 25 years of data preservation, for data that is part of a clinical trial this is mandatory. 7. [REDACTED] do you already know which repository you will use? for sequencing you can consider EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) and for data for which there is no suitable disciplinary repository you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
